episodes.title: The rise and fall (and possible comeback) of Abercrombie & Fitch Part 1
episodes.description:
Intro 00:00-1:52
History of Abercrombie & Fitch 1:53-8:32
The 2000's: Controversial Era 8:33-12:25
Rac!st Tshirts 12:26-19:00
Bruce Weber 19:01-27:00
Legal Issues/Lawsuits 27:01-37:05
Part 1 Conclusion 37:06-37:35
Thank you to patrons & members 37:36-37:42

Report to the FTC https://reportfraud.ftc.gov/

TLC Casting Tony's stepdaughter 25:37-35:13

episodes.title: Tony & Susan Alamo and their cult Part 1
episodes.description:
This is part one of my two part series about Tony & Susan Alamo and their cult.

Since I’m only giving a brief over of this story, a great two part series about this cult are by a creator named Sommer Sanchez
